items.plot: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.
items.title: The Matrix
items.director: Lilly Wachowski/Lana Wachowski/James McTeigue/Colin Fletcher/Victoria Sullivan/Tom Read/Noni Roy/Paul Sullivan/Toby Pease
items.studios: Village Roadshow Pictures/Groucho II Film Partnership/Silver Pictures/Warner Bros. Pictures

items.plot: Investigative journalist Eddie Brock attempts a comeback following a scandal, but accidentally becomes the host of Venom, a violent, super powerful alien symbiote. Soon, he must rely on his newfound powers to protect the world from a shadowy organization looking for a symbiote of their own.
items.title: Venom
items.director: K.C. Hodenfield/Ruben Fleischer/Spiro Razatos/Dea Cantu/Alina Gatti/Mari Wilson/Diane Durant/Michael Saunders
items.studios: Avi Arad Productions/Matt Tolmach Productions/Pascal Pictures/Marvel Entertainment/Tencent Pictures
items.writer: Scott Rosenberg/Scott Rosenberg/Todd McFarlane/Jeff Pinkner/Jeff Pinkner/Kelly Marcel/David Michelinie/Mike Zeck
